title: Make a Great Career in Hospitality Sector
text:
Make a Great Career in Hospitality Sector Make a Great Career in Hospitality Sector 0 
Does the idea of sitting in an office for nine to five bore you? On contrary, do you like traveling and meeting new people? If the answer is yes, then hospitality is surely a great career option for you. Hospitality is one of the most challenging and interesting industry that offers a range of career opportunities. It deals with customer service and ensures that customers get the best experience of their life. Tourism and hotel management are two important parts of hospitality industry. Nowadays with rapid globalization, this industry is growing at a fast pace. It has come out as a glamorous career and this is the major reason why more and more students are taking their higher education in courses of hotel management and tourism. According to the current market situation, India is a profitable destination for all hotels and restaurant chains looking for growth. There are a number of job opportunities in the domestic as well as international market for graduates in hotel management. 
In India, you will find a number of universities and institutes that provide hotel management courses at bachelors and masters level. A bachelor degree in hotel management can be used as a stepping stone to enter the hospitality industry. Students can also go for an advanced diploma course in hospitality which trains them in various hospitality skills required for the job. There are universities that offer short term certificate courses in safety standards for food and sanitation, hotel administration analysis of quantity food production and marketing and merchandising in the hotel industry. In these courses, more emphasis is given on practical knowledge rather than theoretical, which gives students a competitive edge over others. Students are taught skills of food and beverage management, sales and marketing, hospitality law, hospitality environmental sustainability, hospitality information technology and advance wine studies. After completing the course successfully, they can work as a food or beverage attendant in any restaurant or bar. 
Tourism is also an important part of the hospitality sector. Well, if you have good communication skills and like working as a part of team, then you can surely have a good career in tourism. Nowadays, employers usually prefer students who have taken a course in tours and travel, so taking good education is important. After completing a degree or diploma course you can easily work as a tour operator in any travel agency. You can also work as a travel counselor or travel media expert. Ajay Sharma is a professional writer.He writes about the career benefits of doing hotel management courses . And also states that with this course one can also make career in tourism industry .
